title: Lovely Bungalow coming September in Ferndale
posting_body: For rent beginning in September is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 1 bath in Ferndale.
I'm the tenant that's been living here for the past year, but I'm moving to Denver and my landlord asked me to list it (landlord is awesome btw).
House is great and in an awesome neighborhood.
Right across the street from one park, and two blocks down from another w/ disc golf course.
There are 2 bedrooms, a living room, a dining room, then the kitchen.
Also a great front porch and back porch.
Rent is $1,200/mo and you cover utilities.
Also open to renting the home partially furnished.
If you're interested, please email for more info or to come see it.
